website_summaries.verdict: Works well in smaller rooms and would suit a young child or an adult who prefers a smaller-scale work area.
pros: Features under-the-desk keyboard storage and abundant cubicle shelving for books, office equipment, and knickknacks
cons: At 35.5 inches, its work surface is on the smaller end, but its superior vertical storage capacity compensates nicely for this

customer_reviews.title: Great compact desk for small space
customer_reviews.text: This desk is nicer than I expected it to be for assemble-yourself furniture in this price range. I looked at some less-expensive desks with similar designs, and I'm really glad I read the reviews and went with this model. The pieces fit nicely together, and it seems very sturdy/high quality. I included photos with my 15-inch laptop on it for scale, as the desk is on the small side, which may not work for a larger person. There's plenty of storage in the adjustable shelves. (The geometric shelf that the chair faces is not included with the desk; I bought it separately at Target.) Overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: azmom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vanity desk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this desk to use as a vanity in a small nook in my home. It really maximized the space! I was able to put it together myself but definitely recommend getting someone to help! I love that all of the shelves are adjustable and the corner design puts everything within reach.
customer_reviews.author: Aelore

customer_reviews.title: Only one problem
customer_reviews.text: I really like this desk/bookcase, it was just what I wanted for the space. Luckily I did not need the shelves on the outer two upper sections as the holes are not lined up. The middle section is fine but when I tried to put shelves in the outer sections they were not straight. I did put this together myself and I love the color, taupe. I am a 5'2" female and the desk height is fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie in Gualala

customer_reviews.title: Comes from Canada, takes forever!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived with a damaged board, so we had to wait for a replacement from Canada! Originally it took almost 2 weeks to receive, then another 6 days for the replacement piece. Customer service was very nice and easy to deal with, but the wait time was frustrating! Once the desk is on, the unit feels stable. But the bookshelf by itself did not feel super sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: It fit perfectly in the corner that I needed it in!
customer_reviews.text: It took a little longer then I thought it would to receive it, which is why I gave it 4 stars. But otherwise it is sturdy, it was fairly easy to put together, it did take 2 of us to do it. And it is best to determine before hand what side you want the desk on before you finish putting it together. We had to undo a couple of times because we had to do the other side of what the directions were. But it is great and works well!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bell

customer_reviews.title: Good size and satisfied with only one minor modification
customer_reviews.text: Needed to use in a small space so this worked well. Assembly wasn't hard. The quality was acceptable. We chose to only mount the end of the desk to the shelf component, instead of flush...(as originally designed), in order to allow for more leg room. The final arrangement works well. Pleased with the shelf space and size of the surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Straight to the point

customer_reviews.title: Cheap thin particle board already damaged:(
customer_reviews.text: Just opened yesterday to build my daughter's desk but piece #8 has huge hole in it. I called Monarch service number and was on wait cue for 30+ minutes despite the fake voice recording that says "your wait time is 1 minute!". Got fed up so went to order damaged part online. No confirmation until next day... Cheap thin particle board, I will hold further review when replacement part arrives...
customer_reviews.author: Monkichi Orchidea

customer_reviews.title: High quality - easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This desk is perfect. It arrived well packaged with no damaged parts (which I was nervous about) I assembled it by myself before my husband even got home from work in less than an hour. Directions were easy to understand and parts were clearly labeled. I did take take the same route as many other reviewers and attached the desk at the front only for more space. Overall while this desk is a little small its perfect and high quality. I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the quality of this desk. I especially like that the design is very versatile. Just be careful with the glue if you plan to switch the desk orientation up eventually. The particle board will rip out in big chunks with the pegs. I know that seems like a given, just thought I'd put that out there for anyone planning to blindly follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Super cute - love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm doing online grad school and needed a functional desk that would fit in our small guest room, and this worked out perfectly.I have a fairly large HP All-in-One PC and it does fit on the table top but there's not a lot of room to spare. This did not take long to assemble. My husband is pretty handy with this kind of stuff but isn't an expert or anything, and he put it together by himself in about 2 hours. The directions were all pictures and to ME they looked crazy complicated, but he didn't have trouble at all. If you're used to "some assembly required", you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces and children! With instructions if needed!
customer_reviews.text: I got this desk for my 7 year old daughter since we are not virtual learning. Her desk before was storage for junk and we are very limited on space in her room so I thought this would work great to have storage space and desk space. I love the size for her room and the storage, the shelves can change sizes also if you need them to. This is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: but I can honestly say this was a great purchase! I am 7 months pregnant and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about this after reading the reviews, but I can honestly say this was a great purchase! I am 7 months pregnant and I put this thing together alone within an hour. The parts are sturdy, it looks very similar to my Ikea piece, and there is plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kinkade

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in our home!!: D Just ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in our home!! :D Just in case you were wondering. If you have an average cannon printer, it may not fit in any of the boxes below or above. It would fit in the big middle section lengthwise, but it would be lopsided since it runs into the desk portion. It now sits on the very top of the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Bought it Twice
customer_reviews.text: This desk has proven sturdy. Bought one for oldest child 6 years ago. Has performed so well that we bought for younger sibling. The directions lack words, but the pictures are clear and easily followed. Great purchase for completing school work at home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NO
customer_reviews.text: No just no. It is not as big as it looks and is overall not worth what they asked in price for it.
customer_reviews.author: Charolette E. Purviance

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble, very sturdy and overall a great desk for the price. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MeowMomma

customer_reviews.title: Good product with a few suggestions.
customer_reviews.text: This item was better than expected, instructions were very clear and all parts labeled very clearly. However, I would like to make a few suggestions. It would have been more helpful if the instructions had been on top of parts (rather than at the very bottom) so that I could have checked off the parts (number of) as I emptied the box. The desk part mounted on top of the shelves seems like wasted space, if a bracket (maybe two) were included and the "leg" part of the desk was 1 inch shorter the desk part could be mounted flush with the shelf and give that much more space for the desk top.
customer_reviews.author: B A THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Decent shelves and space for a laptop
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and color, but fairly small. Needed something for a compact space with room for decor, so it’s functional for my needs. The desk area is very small, and took forever to put together, due to unclear instructions.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great desk for the price. Very heavy. Did as other reviewers suggested and adjusted the main desk to be a little wider. Put it together by myself(with my 2 yo) so not difficult just time consuming. This is actually the lowest price I found anywhere. Local stores in my area had it at just under $400.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Lohr

customer_reviews.title: Very small but perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This desk has a small footprint but is big on useable space. The layout is great and I will never own a big desk again after this one. It is amazing once you size down how you realize you don't really need a whole lot of space. The quality is good so far. The veneered wood will scratch but no peeling yet (we've had it for 6 months). Easy assembly and the matching pieces are great. I have the whole set. The stair step bookcase and the tv console. I love this set. Sturdy but light, small but efficient.
customer_reviews.author: N. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: but we made it through following the pictures just fine. This is in my 7 year old daughter's ...
customer_reviews.text: The desk is exactly what I was hoping for. It took about an hour and 15 minutes with two people to put together. Directions were a tiny bit busy, but we made it through following the pictures just fine. This is in my 7 year old daughter's room. It stores her collections, books, and treasures, and is still a good place for her to sit and do her homework.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: It worked out great for our needs! We bought two, and placed one on either side of the window. They were easy to put together, very wipeable, and are sturdy enough for our children to do arts and crafts and school work. The shelves are movable so we could set them where we needed them. No problems with these desks at all!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Thyne

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very Quickly. But unfortunately it arrived Damaged. And the glue is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a desk that would not be overwhelming in a smaller craft space. This desk is just right! My husband put it together in record time and it holds so much stuff! I am so excited about this product! A great purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: 'Most' assembly required
customer_reviews.text: Very nice once assembled. It arrived in a very large & heavy box (with some slight damage in the corner of one shelf). It was challenging to assemble and the glue was old & separated. Just be sure to follow all the assembly instructions exactly!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great for bay-area apartment cubicles
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, have an apartment like me that spans a whopping 370 SQ ft? You're in luck! Have something larger? Well then you're even luckier than I
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: Good things come to those who wait
customer_reviews.text: Prompt delivery quality product all parts present and accounted for
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: My husband is VERY satisfied with his new desk
customer_reviews.text: Came as promised - fits perfectly in the corner of our small living room. My husband is VERY satisfied with his new desk. We searched for months to find the one for our needs. This one definitely came through and fit the bill!
customer_reviews.author: Reconciled To You

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! It was very easy to put together and feels sturdy. The desk portion is a bit smaller than I expected, but it's well proportioned and a good size for what I need I love it! If anything changes, I'll post an update.
customer_reviews.author: Andie Pearce

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: a great space saver, sturdy looking, and very easy to assemble. It is great as a corner desk for kids under 12. As an earlier reviewer mentioned, you don't need to put glue if you plan to rearrange in future. I skipped the instructions for under desk slider as I don't plan to use a keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Rathore

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect desk for my small space
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous after reading some of the previous reviews. This is the perfect desk for my small space. I was able to put it together by myself in an hour and a half (with the assistance of a two and a five-year-old, wink, wink). The trick is to lay out all of the pieces first and follow the directions exactly. It looks great and fits perfectly! It is not a big desk, it is not for a tall person, but would be great for someone looking for something to fit in a small space or for a child/teenager's room.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Underwood

customer_reviews.title: This desk has lots of storage but the space between ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk has lots of storage but the space between the cubby part and the desk is very small. Also, canvas bins will not fit in the cubbies/shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Distelrath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for corner of bedroom and very nice looking. Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Goog pi
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice desk and the price was good however, it wasn't as easy to put together the instructions were vague.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Nelson

customer_reviews.title: shipment damaged product
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I had pictured. Took a long time to assemble. The glue they provide was solid and could not be used, so I had to purchase some gorilla wood glue for the wood pegs. Shipment by UPS was horrible. Some of the boards came to me damaged. However, that is not related to the product, more the shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Pam A

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY!!
customer_reviews.text: Just dont use the glue on the desk part when assembling just in case you want to rearrange things later as you wont be able to switch sides as everything will be permant
customer_reviews.author: Amiee G

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fir smaller spaces. I added contact paper to mine to make it looks fancy :) I was missing a small piece (part of the keyboard tray) but I didn’t plan to add it anyway. The seller was more than kind and gave me back some of my money as they don’t sell individual pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Halle

customer_reviews.title: great sturdy desk with tons of storage
customer_reviews.text: i use this for book, makeup, art supply, and knick knack storage, small and sturdy desk
customer_reviews.author: Erikah Adams

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product arrived
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged. Could not begin assembly, waiting to hear from monarch about replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: C Ferg

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, very rapid delivery, the table itself is great for small spaces, and is very customisable. You do have to be careful with cups because it swells the material very easily. Other than that, great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Vasallo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: The desk is more than I hoped for. Durable, room for my books and doo-dads. Attractive with any decor. I could not have asked for more. Thanks for creating such a wonderful piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: oogaBugga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect teenager desk
customer_reviews.text: We really like the desk for our 14 year old, but my husband is worried she'll outgrow it before too long. This would not be a great choice for an adult that isn't petite. It wasn't that hard to put together, but it definitely takes more than one person, some space, and a solid 2 hours to build.
customer_reviews.author: Picky Mom

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and the cubby shelves
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the cubby shelves; but be aware that the computer desk itself is smaller than it appears in the photo. My task chair with arms doesn't fit and I've had to get a smaller chair. The pullout keyboard tray can hold a standard size keyboard but not a mouse and mouse pad.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Ottinger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build, even by myself. and has held up to my books and knick knack collection great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Very good desk .it's perfect for my room, I like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Jia mai

customer_reviews.title: Great small desk.
customer_reviews.text: Great computer desk for small areas. Easy to put together and very sturdy. Lots of storage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hodrick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and goes together easy. It took a long time to get to me.
customer_reviews.author: Noffy

customer_reviews.title: fits brilliantly
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well built this is and how nicely it fits in a corner. it is a great way to utilize a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: After moving into a new apartment, I had been looking for a desk and bookcase to fit in the corner of my bedroom. I purchased this from Amazon, received it in 2 days with free shipping and assembled it myself in about 2 hours. The instructions are easy to follow and the completed product looks great in its space. Great color, very solid/sturdy, great value for the price. Would recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Happy!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and I love it. After reading the reviews I was scared it was going to be to small, but it's perfect :-)
customer_reviews.author: Karma McKinley

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk and bookshelf unit. It is perfect for my home office. I teamed it up with closet maid expresso colored cubes it was a perfect match. Delivery was on time. I assembled it all by myself in about 2 hours. Had only one board that the pre drilled holes didn't match up but it was an easy fix with a common drill bit.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa G. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great fit for my space, not hard to put together
customer_reviews.author: tress

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: we needed a small desk for a very small temporary home we are living in. works great in the small space and provides storage.
customer_reviews.author: esen zentner

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than what I expected. Connections desk about just ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than what I expected. Connections desk about just affix to outer edge so there isn't an edge to deal with on the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Dykota James

customer_reviews.title: Great product...Nice construction
customer_reviews.text: This desk was easy to put together, it has solid construction and very roomy. I would recommend this to my freinds and family
customer_reviews.author: melisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Works great for the small space I was working with. It was shorter than I had expected (even though I should have made note of it in the dimension description), but it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Babytoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk - But Surface is Small
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together as I found the directions to be very clear. Like the ease with which I can access my supplies, and the pull out drawer is much more useful than I'd ever have imaged! I just wish the desk surface was longer than it is! In reading the description and looking at the measurements, it "read" to be ~ 1ft longer than it is in reality.
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Cataleta

customer_reviews.title: Quality Yet Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This desk is top quality all the way. It has great looks along with strong structural integrity . The manufacturer has it down to a science for ease of assembly with clear and well written instructions. It took about 1 hour of easy assembly by numbers! I would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: coolingwater911

customer_reviews.title: Corner computer desk
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk. Fits perfectly in my small space, looks just like the picture! The design is just what I was looking for... So happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ava B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic desk for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Great design, plenty of storage - fantastic desk for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great small desk.
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this desk for years now but always forgot to review it. It came with a wooden piece chiped almost hañf way down and was a lot smaller than i expected. My room however is that big so it ended up working fairly well.great for small spaces with alot of storage space.
customer_reviews.author: SGuzman

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a small space
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, better than expected. The instructions were not included, so we had to find it on line and read from the phone screen- inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Rose

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and very sturdy. Looks great in my daughter's room. As suggested by another reviewer, I decided to extend the desk portion out by attaching it only at the outermost screw hole. This leaves more room for a chair. I also left off the keyboard tray to give it a cleaner look and my daughter didn't need it for her laptop. Very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Stierwalt

customer_reviews.title: It's ok... smaller than I imagined. ...
customer_reviews.text: It's ok...smaller than I imagined..that is my own fault for not measuring it. It is a compact desk for small spaces. Does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: just as expected
customer_reviews.text: The desk is perfect. It's small with tons of storage. We put fabric cube baskets in the top part. You'll need an extra person to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I thought it would be! It works for kids!
customer_reviews.author: trwrocks

customer_reviews.title: not bad ,  thanks
customer_reviews.text: just match my daughter's small room,tks we can put a lot of books in there ,it is sooooooooo good, we all like it.
customer_reviews.author: whynot

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: I thought the desk would have been bigger because the pictures showed the unit much larger! Seeing is always believing!
customer_reviews.author: PEACE2U

customer_reviews.title: broken piece
customer_reviews.text: Well, I like the desk, but one of the pieces came broken, and it was just too much work to returned it.
customer_reviews.author: maria bonilla

customer_reviews.title: I never got this item
customer_reviews.text: never got it since it was damaged on delivery. I just thought that i would let everyone know since i did read the reviews before getting it and still chose to take my chances. although my second choice desk is coming so i am excited about that now.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: This is absolute garbage. First it was damaged upon arrival. Second, the pieces were numbered incorrectly for assembling. Third, it was missing the last piece for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: timothy moren

customer_reviews.title: Terrific piece
customer_reviews.text: Definitely is more of a gray than a brown (which was exactly what I wanted)! Plenty of storage and the flexibility to flip the direction of the desk make this a great buy. Construction wasn't too crazy either.
customer_reviews.author: Chomak21

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I loved it so Much . Makes me feel good and it's cute
customer_reviews.author: BJ

product_meta.title: Monarch Specialties I Storage-Bookcase Left Or Right Set Up-Corner Desk with Multiple Adjustable Shelves, 60"L, Cappuccino
feature_bullets: Modern, thick paneled desk-bookcase combo in a sophisticated cappuccino
Ample surface area space with 10 adjustable shelves to help you stay organized
Desk can be assembled on the left or right hand side
Includes pull out keyboard tray on smooth metal glides
